content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles at positions(-15.5, 18.5), (-15.5, 19.5), (-15.5, 20.5), (-15.5, 21.5), (-19.5, 22.5)

### Copper plate furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0) that processes iron ore into copper plates

### Iron plate furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0) that processes copper ore into iron plates

### Assembling machine for automation science pack at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5) that requires copper plates and iron gear wheels to produce automation science packs

### Pipe groups
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe group with fluid system 43734 at position(-18.5, 16.5)
- Pipe group with fluid system 43737 at position(-12.5, 21.5)
- Pipe group with fluid system 43738 at position(-8.5, 21.5)
- Pipe group with fluid system 43740 at position(-10.5, 22.5)
- Pipe group with fluid system 43741 at position(-7.5, 23.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5) that is currently not conducting any research

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when assembling machines are short on ingredients
- Ensure that the necessary ingredients (copper plates and iron gear wheels) are available in the inventory before attempting to use the assembling machine.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Avoid inserting items into a furnace that already contains a different type of ore. Ensure that the furnace is empty or contains the correct type of ore before inserting new items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities that may block placement.
